channel.title: Tangled on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tangled on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gigi Hadid Reveals That She Auditioned for ‘Tangled’ Live-Action Remake
item.description: “What do we do in this job anymore that scares us?” the supermodel said as she looked back on auditioning for the role of Rapunzel in the now paused live-action film.

item.title: Gigi Hadid Reveals That She Auditioned for ‘Tangled’ Live-Action Remake
item.description: “What do we do in this job anymore that scares us?” the supermodel said as she looked back on auditioning for the role of Rapunzel in the now paused live-action film.

item.title: Gigi Hadid Auditioned for Rapunzel in Disney’s ‘Tangled’ Live-Action Remake Before It Got Paused After ‘Snow White’ Flop: ‘I Was Proud of My Scene’
item.description: Gigi Hadid revealed in a new Vogue magazine cover story that she auditioned for the lead role of Rapunzel in Disney’s live-action “Tangled” remake before the project was put on hold

item.title: Gigi Hadid Auditioned for Rapunzel in Disney’s ‘Tangled’ Live-Action Remake Before It Got Paused After ‘Snow White’ Flop: ‘I Was Proud of My Scene’
